name: Sensodyne Toothpaste Fresh Gel
description: Sensodyne® Fresh Gel for sensitive teeth is a desensitizing toothpaste that comes in a cool blue gel for people who prefer gels. It relieves sensitive teeth by building soothing protection around the nerve, deep inside the tooth and helps to keep the sensation from coming back. Sensodyne® Fresh Gel toothpaste has a refreshing taste that leaves your mouth feeling clean.*Images are illustration purpose only. Product recieved may vary.
